data.eml:eml: New data on the taxonomy, distribution and host plants of Australian Epermeniidae (Lepidoptera: Epermenioidea)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gaedike, Reinhard (2018): New data on the taxonomy, distribution and host plants of Australian Epermeniidae (Lepidoptera: Epermenioidea). Zootaxa 4524 (1): 33-50, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4524.1.2
